text: Chloe Bridges (born December 27, 1991) is an American actress. She works mostly in movies. She has also done some television programs. She starred in the comedic drama Forget Me Nots, and played Donna in The Carrie Diaries. She was born in Houma, Louisiana. Bridges married actor and comedian Adam DeVine in 2021. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Louisiana Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors
title: Chloe Bridges
